title: Spiderstep Staff
content:
Spiderstep Staff Uncommon 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Bludgeoning Spider Step: Immune to being Enwebbed. Your movement speed is not affected by web surfaces. Main Hand OnlyTopple Slightly sticky to the touch, this staff has excellent grip. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 180
